shortTitle: Concurrent Resolution Approving Site for New State Correctional Facilities
longTitle: This concurrent resolution of the Legislature and the Governor approves a site for new state correctional facilities.
subjectList: Special Session, Resolutions, State Institutions, Department of Corrections, Government Operations (State Issues), Government Operations (State Issues)
provisions: This resolution:  recites the policy decision to move the state prison facilities currently located in Draper to another location;  recites the history of the process of identifying a suitable site for new state correctional facilities;  approves the site chosen by the Prison Relocation Commission as the site for the development of new state correctional facilities;  directs the Division of Facilities Construction and Management to acquire property at the site adequate for the development of new state correctional facilities; and  expresses the intent of the Legislature and Governor as to the redevelopment of the former state prison property.
